comment: Perform induction over the multiplicative structure of ` NN ` . If a property ` ph ( x ) ` holds for the primes and ` 1 ` and is preserved under multiplication, then it holds for every positive integer. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Jun-2015.)
